name: Zedric's Non-Math Thing
description:
Can you escape Zedric's Hangout House/ Bacon High? You're friend invited you there but it's abandoned. Nobody is there. But Zedric and others are...

2 chapters, and another one soon!

A Baldi's Basics fangame

For people at the age of 10 and higher

For non-Windows users, there will be a .html version soon for ya'll to play :)
